product_name: Anastasia Beverly HillsSmudge-Proof Matte Liquid Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeLiquid Lipstick by Anastasia Beverly Hills is a full-pigment liquid lip color formula that dries down to a weightless matte finish for smudge-proof wearability and long-lasting color. This comfortable matte formula delivers full-coverage wear and creates the appearance of fuller lips.
details: DetailsBenefitsFeatures a double-sided flat applicator with a rounded tip that distributes the perfect amount of product for precise applicationThe long-wearing shades are versatile enough for customization, so you can mix and match multiple shades without losing pigmentFeaturesCruelty-freeItem 2300402How To UseApply to lips as desired.IngredientsCrush: Isododecane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Kaolin, Petrolatum, Dimethicone, Isobutylmethacrylate/Bis-Hydroxypropyl Dimethicone Acrylate Copolymer, Beeswax/Cera Alba/Cire D'abeille, Polyester/Dimethicone/Ipdi Copolymer, Polysilicone-11, Phenoxyethanol, Cyclomethicone, Cyclotetrasiloxane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate. May Contain: Red 6 (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 27(CI 45410), Red 30 Lake (CI 73360), Carmine (CI 75470), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: got sent  A USED PRODUCT
reviews.comments: TAMPER SEAL WAS NOT INTACT. Fingerprints were all over the top part. Product looked like it was already touched when I opened it. shame on you ULTA.

reviews.headline: confidence booster!
reviews.comments: American Doll is actually what got me into red lipsticks! i used to swear off all lip products except chapstick because i was insecure about my lips (liner helps a ton lol). the formula is great, easy to apply, quick drying. i took off a star because it's not actually smudge proof. takes a lot of friction to smudge it but it does last hours even with drinking, eating, and pecks on the cheek

reviews.headline: Disappointing.
reviews.comments:
The color of Kathryn is nothing like the description - brown berry? No, more like hot pink berry. I was hoping it might oxidize or something after I applied it, but no. It still remains an obnoxious pink that I was not going for. Would definitely not recommend. 

I also don't like how it feels on my lips. So there's that as well.

reviews.headline: A great Nude shade!
reviews.comments: A wonderful, long lasting nude shade that does not feel dry or sticky like so many liquid lipsticks, it goes on very smooth and creamy. It is the nude go to for both my partner and I!  I just wish they had some more vibrant colors that felt so nice and lasted so long!

reviews.headline: Meh.
reviews.comments: Color is pretty but it doesn't last long at all against eating/drinking. Nyx makes a better one. Definitely not worth the ridiculous price.

reviews.headline: I would purchase this product again.
reviews.comments: Nice matte color with ability to STAY on throughout the night!

reviews.headline: Wrong color
reviews.comments: I dont know if anastasia reformulated their lip products but this is not it . I used to wrar Dusty rose and i remember it being a little on the darker mauve pink side . The color i received this timr aroubd looks like a hot pink. And its ugly . I do not recommend it .

reviews.headline: My favorite lipstick
reviews.comments: This is not only the best, most long-lasting lipstick I've ever used, but it's also the absolute perfect shade for my complexion. I wore this lipstick yesterday to an event, and multiple people told me how well it goes with my skin tone. Even after eating messy foods, the lipstick barely budged all night. I have already recommended this brand to multiple people, it's worth the price.

reviews.headline: Love the color Veronica
reviews.comments: Have gotten beautiful compliments love the red not too orangey great for fall!

reviews.headline: Not what I was looking for exactly..
reviews.comments: Color is good. Looking for a creme matte lip stain...still not what I am looking for...

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: I wanted to love it but sadly it made my lips soooo dry! It's not as bad when you use a lipliner and chap stick but you shouldn't have too for the price

reviews.headline: Love!
reviews.comments: Purchased on sale to give a try, awesome! I usually use Colourpops matte lipsticks, however this one is awesome because it doesnt feel as dry or cracky as time goes on. When applying super smooth and applicator is good. Def gonna purchase more shades.

reviews.headline: Fake Anathasia lipstick
reviews.comments: The pure hollywood color came in a different packaging an it looks like a fake it does not look like a real anesthesia  lipstick I spoke to customer service a they sending a replacement so will update !!! Please be careful an check it

reviews.headline: Possibly the worst lip product ever
reviews.comments: This product smudges so bad and also does not stay on your lips long if you are doing anything orher than keeping your mouth shut lol. It also dried out my lips and feels chalky.  I tried it in several occasions but now refuse to wear it outside the house since I dont know where it's going migrate on my face throughout the day. Swing and a miss on this one.

reviews.headline: I loved the color, it looks super beautiful on my lips.
reviews.comments:
Even though the color doesn't last long, I liked it.

Comentarios

Practica hablar en inglÃ©s

reviews.headline: Sarafine red lipstick: just okay
reviews.comments: I love the color of Sarafine. However after just 4 hours it was faded and smudged. Granted I was eating and drinking but it literally says smudge proof and long lasting, and it's not. What a shame.

reviews.headline: i would purchase this over and over again
reviews.comments: I love this matte lipstick. I see all the comments about the dryness but I found a way to make it work for me. Before applying, I do a lip scrub. I don't know if it will work for everyone but it does for me. I love this because I can confidently wear it and not worry that it will come off while eating or drinking.

reviews.headline: no it is very dry on the lips
reviews.comments: you put it and it matts quickly, very drying

reviews.headline: drying matte lip, but it stays on there
reviews.comments: pretty color only needed one layer. i would not wear this often because it will dry your lips out significantly. lasts all day and transfer proof until your lips come in contact with oily food

reviews.headline: Too drying
reviews.comments:
I put this lipstick on in the morning.  A few hours after I went  to Ulta to look at other lipsticks and 
wiped this off, and my lips were very chapped. So chapped that they started bleeding. I will be returning the two that I purchased immediately.

faceoff_positive.comments: I bought several colors and im so inlove with each of them! I im a makeup artist and blogger and get the most insane comments on these and so do my cliends
faceoff_positive.headline: Gorgeous bold red and deep purple

faceoff_negative.comments: I was really excited for this product. Put it on for a birthday party. As I put it on I can already feel how dry it feels. Not like the rest of the other ones id purchased. I got to the car and looked in the mirror. I noticed how cakey it looks and feels. My corner started peeling. My bottom looked like I peeled a piece off which I didn't. I put a little dab to cover the spot thinking I missed a spot but it didn't work so I had to layer another coat on my lips. After eating I had to wipe the color off my lips because it looked like I peeled chunks here and there off. Horrible purchase. Highly disappointed after reading "great" reviews on it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Texture
